GAME INSTRUCTIONS

Why play this game?
  • It's more wholesome than coffee or sweets - remember "Those cookies aren't love..."
  • Carry on playing only until you feel empowered to return to your coding with confidence.
  • The game is short. You won't get hooked. Return whenever you feel the need to do so. There is an enormous pool of questions to boost your ego as a coder.
  • Everybody wins. You will always receive a positive feedback.
  • This game is non-competitive. Everybody wins - even if you give the wrong answer!
How to play this game?
  1. Click on the "Start" button.
  2. Reply to the question.
  3. You will receive immediate feedback.
  4. Reply to the next question - there will only be five of them.
  5. Bask in the immediate gratification of the relaxing atmosphere and the guilt-free pat on your back.
What to expect from this game?
  • It is friendly for users with impairement, with easily read user-interface and alt-captions.
  • You can play it on any device.
  • You can play it and forget it, as soon as you have gained the needed confidence. If you liked it, you can remember it like your grandma fondly told you about Tetris...
